violations.message: FAIL: Line 10: Lazy Imports (yaml import inside bootstrap section before setup_imports instead of at module top); Line 15: Exception → None pattern risk (setup_imports may return None without type annotation verification); Line 23: Uncaught YAML Parse (yaml.safe_load with no try/except); Line 23: Uncaught File Read (config_path.read_text() with no try/except); Line 37: Uncaught Server Initialization (DataOpsFastMCPServer instantiation with no try/except); Line 38: Uncaught Server Run (server.run with no try/except)
